DOC.brief_summary: This trial design evaluate safety , tolerability immunogenicity bedside mix formulation adjuvanted influenza vaccine .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Safety , Tolerability Immunogenicity Bedside Mixing Combination Two Adjuvanted Influenza Vaccines
DOC.criteria: Healthy 18 39 year old male females good health provide informed consent prior enrollment serious medical condition allergy vaccine component , include limited egg/chicken product reduce immune function recent use immunosuppressive therapy recent use influenza vaccine
